examples.example: 他有一头乌黑亮丽的头发，十分帅气。

translate.english: He has jet-black and shiny hair and is very handsome.

examples.example: 他牵着一头老牛走在乡间小路上，画面十分温馨。

translate.english: He led an old cow walking on the country road, and the picture was very warm.

examples.example: 我买了一头可爱的小猪，准备把它养成大肥猪。

translate.english: I bought a cute little pig and am going to raise it into a big fat pig.
